WorkItem.Description:
I just have a few questions for the community.  
Â 
Is there a character export addon different than the rpgo one? for some reason whenever i import the character into Rawr it locks all the items and i have to go through all 15 categories and unlock them.
Is there a command to set anything i import as available?
In my shadow priest i have yet to enchant my legs so when i try to optimize it it gives me an error... i got back to the main character sheet and choose the enchant then hit the optimization again and it is the same error.

Comments.Message:
What do you mean with "locks your items" ?
If you're referring to the fact it's putting green diamonds next to the items. Then yes, that's what it's supposed to be doing: Mark all the items you have in your inventory and bags as available.

You need to make sure you put green diamonds next to the enchants you have access to as well, not just your gear.    Just adding the enchant to the gear you are wearing does not mark it available to the optimiser.
